description.value:
A Folding Shovel for filling sandbags and digging trenches. Can be used as an improvised weapon (1d5+3 R, Pen 0, Primitive (8), Unwieldy)

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Average

Notes: 15 T
